title: Degeneration card
data:
{{version031}} {{Flavour|The card depicts a dragon whose scales are sloughing off, revealing a sheep underneath.}} The '''degeneration card''' attempts to [[polymorph]] monsters into ones with lower [[HD]]. For targets of such valid holiness, it will also afflict them with [[Malmutate]]. Undead targets, which decompose rather than shift in form when inflicted with mutagenic energies, will be [[dazed]]. The card can be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] over these two versions. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.15]] ![[0.16]] and beyond |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of destruction|Destruction]]
[[Deck of war|War]] !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of destruction|Destruction]] |---- |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.31]], polymorphing monsters caused them to heal (often to full health). *The Degeneration card was one of 23 cards to be kept when decks were simplified in [[0.19]]. *Prior to [[0.16]], it did not malmutate or daze targets. *The Degeneration card was added in [[0.15]]. ==See also== *[[Cards]] *[[Decks]] {{cards}} [[Category: Deck]]
